text: Directly accessible from Punggol bus interchange and Punggol MRT, LRT. In between the UOB and OCBC ATMs.

This kiosk does not have a scale. You should weigh the letter / package ahead of time.

Also, the closest posting box at "punggol MRT station" is actually at  the bus interchange (.
NETS machine could not read my cards
Doesn't have a weighing scale for letters and parcels.
